section.title: Poll Function
section.paragraph: The NodeTree.poll function determines if a node tree is visible in the given context (similar to how Panel.poll and Menu.poll define visibility). If it returns False, the node tree type will not be selectable in the node editor.
A typical condition for shader nodes would be to check the active render engine of the scene and only show nodes of the renderer they are designed for.

desc_content.paragraph: Node tree consisting of linked nodes used for shading, textures and compositing
Node Tree type (deprecated, bl_idname is the actual node tree type identifier)

field_body.paragraph: float array of 2 items in [-inf, inf], default (0.0, 0.0), (readonly)

desc_content.paragraph: Get a node tree from the context

field_body.paragraph: result_1, Active node tree from context, NodeTree
result_2, ID data-block that owns the node tree, ID
result_3, Original ID data-block selected from the context, ID
The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
